Texts.Eng: Excellent. Now I can distill raw rage into crystalline form and feed it to my babies! Just in time for the ballet! Take this crap as a thanks.

I'm unsure I can trust you after that whole ^orange;orange fruit^reset; thing, but we'll try again I guess. You ever laid hands on some ^orange;Plasmic Crystal^reset;? If so, I could use about 20. For...reasons. Certainly not involving large flightless birds and carnage.
